page.description: DIR_GET() returns a string containing the current working directory.

section.description: Populate an array with the names of all tables in the A_SPORTS directory. The current directory will be saved and restored after the operation.
section.example: dim file_names[250] as C old_directory = dir_get() dir_put("c:\a5\a_sports") files = filefind.first("*.dbf") I = 1 while .not. files.eof() file_names[I] = files.name() files.next() I = I + 1 end while dir_put(old_directory)
